name: ariel snowflake
notes:
hello!
here is the description to the round textured snowflake "ariel". this snowflake pattern is based on ariel motif pattern.
the description is available in 3 languages: english, italian (unavailable) and russian. 

versione italiana tradotta da julia volta e lisa davì.

the file includes:
1. written instructions;  
2. chart; 
3. a link at video-tutorial on youtube/ the video is in russian with english subtitles.

about the snowflake.

* the pattern has only 8 rounds. 
* the finished doily measures 5 1/2”.
*  materials needed: cotton thread size 10, hook 1,5 mm. but you may use the materials you prefer. 
* thread needed:  20-30 yards
